sources.src/components/updateViews/post.updateVi:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Swal from "sweetalert2"; const initialState = { id:'', title: '', description: '', submittedDate: '', createdEditor:'', status: '', approvedDate: '', approvedAdmin:'', remarks:'' } class updatePosts extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this); //bind onChange function. this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this); //bind onSubmit function. this.state = initialState; //apply states. } onChange(e) { //update states this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } componentDidMount() { const post = this.props.match.params.id; console.log("rrrr" + this.props.match.params.id); axios.get(`http://localhost:7000/post/${post}`) .then(response => { this.setState({ id: response.data.data._id }) this.setState({ title: response.data.data.title }) this.setState({ description: response.data.data.description }) this.setState({ submittedDate: response.data.data.submittedDate }) this.setState({ createdEditor: response.data.data.editors.name }) this.setState({ status: response.data.data.status }) this.setState({ approvedAdmin: response.data.data.admins.name }) this.setState({ approvedDate: response.data.data.approvedDate }) this.setState({ remarks: response.data.data.remarks }) console.log("stat"+response.data.data.status) }) .catch(error => { alert(error.message) }) } onSubmit(e) { //submit details e.preventDefault(); //avoid browser refresh let post = { title: this.state.title, description: this.state.description, submittedDate: this.state.submittedDate, createdEditor: this.state.createdEditor, status: this.state.status, approvedAdmin: this.state.approvedAdmin, approvedDate: this.state.approvedDate, remarks: this.state.remarks } console.log('DATA TO SEND', post); axios.patch(`http://localhost:7000/post/update/${this.state.id}`, post) .then(response => { // alert('Post Data successfully updated') Swal.fire({ position: 'center', icon: 'success', title: 'Updated Posts details has been saved', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 1500 }) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error.message); alert(error.message) }) } render() { return (

Edit Posts

) } } export default updatePosts;
